tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE women_rights_advocates_documents (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  document_title TEXT,
  document_type TEXT,
  author_name TEXT,
  publication_year INT,
  archived_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE WomenRightsAdvocates (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    birth_date DATE,
    occupation VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE
);

CREATE TABLE HistoricalDocuments (
    document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    author VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    publication_date DATE,
    document_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE HistoricalDocuments (
    document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_title VARCHAR(255),
    author VARCHAR(100),
    publication_year INT,
    document_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE WomenAdvocates (
    advocate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    advocate_name VARCHAR(100),
    birth_year INT,
    death_year INT,
    biography TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Speeches (
    speech_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    speaker_name VARCHAR(100),
    speech_title VARCHAR(255),
    event_date DATE,
    speech_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE documents (
  document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  document_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  document_author VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  document_date DATE NOT NULL,
  document_content TEXT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE speeches (
  speech_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  speech_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  speaker_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  speech_date DATE NOT NULL,
  speech_transcript TEXT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE advocates (
  advocate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  advocate_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  advocate_birthdate DATE NOT NULL,
  advocate_country VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  advocate_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE historical_documents (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_title VARCHAR(255),
    document_text TEXT,
    publication_date DATE,
    author_name VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE speeches (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    speech_title VARCHAR(255),
    speech_text TEXT,
    delivery_date DATE,
    speaker_name VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE advocates (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    advocate_name VARCHAR(255),
    advocacy_topic VARCHAR(255),
    birth_date DATE,
    death_date DATE
);
